hero.title: Tools: make risk visible
hero.subtitle: Tools don’t create edge—they enforce clarity. These calculators help you translate intent into numbers: how much you can lose, what size that implies, and what your plan means in R and currency terms. Use them to build a risk boundary and a repeatable execution gate, then review decisions with evidence rather than emotion.
highlights: Position sizing from explicit risk, not guesswork.
R:R and pip value to quantify the plan upfront.
Built to support reviewable, auditable execution.
hero.risk: Educational content only. Not investment advice; trading involves risk.
